resources.string:
Hi, my name is Louis. I just turned 57. 
I enjoy running with my dog in the morning, mountain biking with my daughter Samantha, 
and golfing with my daughter Jaya. 
When I'm not outdoors, I study android development, read, cook, help with house 
chores, and watch movies. In the evenings, I enjoy a glass of wine with my wife and sitting 
 in our beautiful backyard, which we have worked hard on over the years.
